mewara marga salakunu thunsiyayak athulathwa nikuth kara aththe anka 1940/21 darana athiwishesha gasat niwedanaya wana athara eya prawahana ha siwil guwan sewa amathi nimal siripala da silwa mahatha wisin nikuth kara thibe.motar wahana (salakuna, sangnya sanketha ha marga lakunu kirim) niyoga lesa sandahan kara athi mema gasat niwedanaya kriyathmaka wimen pasuwa 1987 marthu 13 dinathi athiwishesha gasat pathraye athulath motar wahana (sangnya) parichjinna we.mema niyoga yatathe anathuru angawime salakunu, niyamana salakunu, mangapenwime thorathuru salakunu, thahanam salakunu, simakari salakunu, widhana salakunu, pramukhatha salakunu ha eeta adala rupasatahan da gasat pathraya magin pahadili kara atha.marga paddhathiya ha rathawahana wadi diyunu wimath samangama mese marga ha wahana sangnya, salakunu sanshodhanaya kara athi athara riyaduran, padikayan, papadikaruwan menma polis niladharin sandaha da me yatathe upades labadi thibe.

gayanaya, sangithaya - greshan aananda gi pada - ke.di.ke. dharmawardhana 11.hima kandu yahane hima kandu yahane wala sadalle sada haritha thuru sewanalle mohothak sangawemu lowin muwa wi ape sihina uyane desithaka bandi - rakawal gilihi yayi thani wu sith ada - nothani wela ee hasaral wila – ma sitha pibidi obata pidennata malak wela kandulak nagi mohothaka oba nethangin lanwemi sitiya da kothana lowe hinahemi esendahi kandulu mudahara obage unusum laya mandale gayanaya - greshan aananda samanga niranjala sarojini 12.hima renu watena hima renu watena sithale netha gawa randawa aadare sudu sela sulange pa kale oba neda mage biso ranthodu salena rawaye sitha gawa bandu malige rathu rosa yahana saduwe mata neda mage mal saro madhupanayak se wahila yanawada dethole gawila ga - manamalayange chethana nokiyada pala sina muthu malayak se yawune api aathma ganane pa sene manamaliyange chethana pawasawi dase latha pada rachanaya - saman chandranath wirasinha gayanaya - greshan aananda samanga latha walpola greshan ge sindu ekathuwak methanin ganna ....
